name: Loteria del Adios (Demo)
description:
Lotería del Adiós is a story of life, love, and learning how to have the strength to let go.

As the final wish from his wife on her death bed, Grandpa Ángel travels to the city to get to know his estranged granddaughter Mayte. A big city is nothing for a tough ex-cop, but the fact that all the city's citizens are characters from the Mexican card game Lotería is a bit...unnerving. Nonetheless, Grandpa fights on to protect his granddaughter and snuff out crime, battling with fast-paced rounds of his favorite childhood game, Lotería.
